main event: A civilian observed a bright light object three times on March 26, 1966, described as the size of a high-flying aircraft.
interesting points: The object was seen at different times during a short period,The observer described the object as elongated and highly maneuverable,The object was compared to a bright silver color,The Air Force confirmed a KC-135 was in the area but the observer did not initially notice it,The sighting was deemed unremarkable, and no further investigation was necessary.
